name: Neon City Rumble
description:
Welcome to Neon City, the not so perfect society. In Neon City everyone has a price on their head, and it's your job as a bounty hunter to reap your reward.

Money doesn't come free though, by collecting bounties you increase the bounty on yourself! This is Neon City Rumble, a first person arena melee combat game that takes place in a moody and vibrant neon cityscape. Play as a bounty hunter, your goal is to eliminate other players and collect their bounties,

doing so will increase your bounty, the player at the end with the highest bounty on their head wins!

Players will utilize their trusty BatAx, Grapple hook and Dashes to maneuver around the arena and chase down their foes.

Gain the upper hand on your opponents and come out on top! Become the Ultimate Bounty Hunter in Neon City Rumble!

Important Info For Running The Game

In order to play the game you need somebody running the server for you. Get the ip address from them and enter it on the lobby screen.

To run the server yourself, download the Server NCR Zip, you can run it from the NeonCityRumbleAsyncServer.exe in the folder it should show you the ip address it detects.

If you are running the server over the internet make sure to go into your router and set up port forwarding on ports 11111 (TCP) and 11112 (UDP) to the computer on which you are running the server, if you are running the game on the same local network (such as two computers on the same wifi) you should not have to do this step
